Chart Builder

Factmint Chart Builder provides a graphical interface for users to quickly generate embed code for Factmint Charts. It also gives users a live preview of the chart that they are creating.

Usage:

N.B. You can use the chart builder without signing in but be aware that you cannot publish a chart on a domain that you have not registered. You can sign in and register a domain at charts.factmint.com.

Data can either be directly input to the Chart Builder, or copied and pasted from a spreadsheet.

Different charts require require a different number of columns and/or formats of data: there are headings at the top of each column to help you with this. For more information about the columns of data required for each chart, please take a look at our full documentation.

Building your Chart:

<ol style="margin-left: 2em;"> <li>The desired chart can be selected from the dropdown above the preview area.</li> <li>The column headers in the input table change according to the chosen visualization to give the user an idea about what data should be in each column.</li> <li>Once the user has input their data and selected their chart, they should see a live preview.</li> <li>Users can manipulate various options relating to the chart in the input fields to the right of the page.</li> </ol> If you paste in a lot of data, the auto-refresh feature may be disabled. You’ll still be able to refresh your preview manually using the refresh button that should dynamically appear in the top right of the preview area.

Publishing your Chart:

  1. Hit the 'Embed' button.
  2. Make sure you've registered the domain on which you want to publish the chart. You can register at http://charts.factmint.com.
  3. Copy the output code snippet.
  4. Paste it into your webpage or CMS.

You might want to play with the sizing of the chart. Take a look at our layout and sizing guide.
